metadata.name: Arthur
metadata.summary: The adventures of eight-year-old Arthur and explores issues faced by real kids.
metadata.description: Arthur aims to foster an interest in reading and writing, to encourage positive social skills, and to model age-appropriate problem-solving strategies. The show chronicles the adventures of eight-year-old Arthur and explores issues faced by real kids.
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
